des: "Goldbrick sauce is a decadent, dark chocolate sauce that turns hard as soon as it hits the cold ice cream.  Store in a jar in the fridge. Reheat in a pan of warm water or in the microwave."
ins: Combine butter, chocolate chips and evaporated milk in the top of a double boiler over simmering water.  Cook and stir until melted and smooth.  Remove from heat and fold in nuts.  Serve warm over ice cream.
